ResearchProjectDef.label: small high-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Techniques for increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medium high-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Techniques for increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra high-density hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Techniques for further increasing plant growth density in an artificial mini-biome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high-density automatic farming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows high density hydroponics to automatically sow and harvest crops.
